# tensorShape()

**Instance Method**

Adds a shape operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func tensorShape() -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<Int32>
```

## Discussion

This function returns a tensor that contains the shape of `self`.
title: tensorShape()
